sentences.english: This will help on days that you don’t feel like cooking.
sentences.chinese: 這樣每天下來你就不會覺得自己在煮飯了。

sentences.english: I can cook. I raise my children. I work hard.
sentences.chinese: 我會煮飯，我負責帶孩子，我努力工作。

sentences.english: Many children don't know how to cook rice.
sentences.chinese: 許多小孩不知道怎麼洗米煮飯。
鼓勵和資助在家裏煮飯。

sentences.english: For example, cleaning up the dishes or cooking dinner is acts of love.
sentences.chinese: 比如說，洗碗煮飯都是愛的表現。

sentences.english: The facility hired a caterer to cook in the facility for employees.
sentences.chinese: 工廠聘請外部的飲食服務公司在廠內煮飯。

sentences.english: But I have no pan, I never cook at home.
sentences.chinese: 但是我沒有啊，我在家從不煮飯的。

sentences.english: She did cooking in the kitchen just one minute before giving birth to me.
sentences.chinese: 母親生我前一分鐘還在竈上煮飯。

sentences.english: In order to make ends meet, still and o business, especially around source with only born.
sentences.chinese: 爲了餬口，還和阿源一同做生意，到處替人煮飯唯生。

sentences.english: My mother was allowed to cook her meals on a gas stove.
sentences.chinese: 母親被允許使用煤氣爐煮飯。

sentences.english: We use those gas cylinders at home.
sentences.chinese: 咱們家是用桶裝的煤氣來煮飯燒菜的。

sentences.english: Stacks of dung cakes, used as cooking fuel, in the village of Kohlua.
sentences.chinese: 科魯瓦村，用作煮飯燃料的糞餅堆。

sentences.english: The pot can be used to cook in and can be eaten out of.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在裏邊煮飯然後就着鍋把他喫掉。

sentences.english: It shows a family boiling food and washing with buckets of foamy water.
sentences.chinese: 海報上有一戶人家在煮飯，用幾桶泡沫水在洗衣服。

definition: to go to the kitchen (to prepare a meal)/to cook
to have a meal/to eat/to make a living
to simmer/soup made by simmering for a long time
